full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI 'CHI BSLU BA'I CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU'I 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG KYANG, BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL @005B BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNYA BADZRA GYI ? THA SHAL BA BKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA'I 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MTSAMS NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD,, ,,DGE'O,, ,,)
